attributes.action: A Knighthood for Captain Tom Moore
attributes.additional_details: Award Captain Tom a Knighthood while we are still blessed to have him among us.
attributes.background: Captain Tom Moore has inspired and amazed our United Kingdom and the world with his amazing fundraising to support our NHS. In his hundredth year, is there a better way to recognise this wonderful man's gift to our NHS than a well-deserved Knighthood?

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
